name: Inflexion Interactive Marketing Agency
tag_list: interactive-marketing-agency, internet-marketing-agency, digital-marketing-agency, web-marketing-agency, web-design-agency, web-development-agency, inflexion-interactive
overview: Inflexion Interactive is the next-generation in digital marketing, providing innovative marketing programs for mid-sized to Fortune 1000 companies. Inflexion Interactive provides internet marketing solutions that fit your business. Services include: Marketing Strategy, Creative, Website Design and Development, Social Media Marketing, Online Advertising, Search Marketing (SEM,SEO), Mobile and Email Marketing. Put internet marketing to work for you with Inflexion Interactive Agency.
